trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Torrance
There were no other sightings in Torrance on or around March 13th 2010
Summary: Very personnal multi events, highly spiritual.
divs: sighting detailsbetween march 13th thru 18th, unreal sightings of a white orb (3 times) and orb multi confiquration (1 time). something i said on line perhaps acted as a catalyst. prior to events for days, my hands were very sweaty, minor headaches, pre-cognition of events,(i bought a monocular to carry prior to?). this was designed just for me,,,, although they allowed for a direct eye witness and an indirect witness. the event of the 17th was so close, i saw the silver configuration with a white band of energy rotate around it clock wise.(the atmosphere was very unusual that a.m.,dense and heavy.) it was a supernatural spiritaul feeling of love coming from it 1,000 times greater than anything you could possibly know in regard to human to human love, i was in tears,(event of the 17th). precepts of reality were shattered.thursday the 18th,walking home, a cluster with an bright red hue to one side was over my head. this it seemed, fullfill a vivid and unusual dream i had in about 1980 or so.in that "dream" i floated out my window, horizontal, along the side of the house to the back yard and then planted feet down looked up and a diamond or kite shape ufo was directly over my head, thats all i remember of the dream. i think i have had other "unusual" things happen going back to 3 1\2 or 4 years old. also about 1983, in lancaster twice (and only twice in my life that happened) i awoke with a ominous feeling of a presence in my room at night, i was terrified and unable to move. telepathy is strongly involved. i think i know what is going on, so do you. 1) the dangerous position of the earth as we approach a tipping point. 2) mankinds inability to evolve as a collective species. 3) the desire from "them" to raise our spiritual and cosmic awareness. we affect them and vice versa perhaps. please i need to talk to someone who can relate and hopefully explain anything to me. the events changed me quite dramatically, for the rest of my life and yet i want more. may god bless us all, *(wit's name deleted -- sgonzalez\cms).
